subject: RTSC Talk Show Today at 6pm est.---Robert Murch (Guest)
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Today we will be welcoming special guest Robert Murch. Robert is an expert at
all things Ouija related. He is a collector and historian on everything about
this mystifying oracle. Join us for the history of talking boards and his
experience with them.

Here's how to listen:

http://www.paranormaltvnetwork.com/channel2.html

We will be taking calls as well as an interactive chat. To call, the number is
732-587-7041 732-587-7041

For more info on Robert, please check out his site:

www.robertmurch.com

See ya in a few hours,
-Steve H.
